message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features that will enhance your daily routine. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Let's start with an offer of $150. Looking forward to your response!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the face value you mentioned earlier. Can we meet in the middle at $130?
